programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: seorang gadis jatuh hati kepada seorang pemuda tampan yang merupakan ketua pegawai eksekutif di syarikat miliknya . Gadis itu mula tertarik kepada pemuda ini setelah beliau bantu mengejar peragut beg tangannya . Pemuda itu turut jatuh hati terhadap si gadis yang pernah membulinya semasa di sekolah dahulu

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Kisah Way, seorang pekerja pejabat biasa yang bekerja secara diam-diam sebagai pembasmi mayat bernama "The Cleaner". Way bekerja sebagai rakan kongsi dengan "The Killer" bernama Guy. Tetapi kemudian satu insiden memaksa Way menjadi pembunuh.

programme.title: Tmo Pada Suatu Cinta Dahulu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Pada Suatu Cinta Dahulu

programme.title: Mandala Penakluk Tar Tar
programme.desc: perjuangan seorang pahlawan untuk menyelamatkan negerinya dijajah oleh kaum lain . Pahlawan tersebut ke negeri penjajah untuk membantah tindakan mereka yang kejam menjajah negerinya

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Hening Senja
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan sebuah keluarga yang bekerja dan berada di puncak . Si isteri masih belum bersedia untuk mempunyai zuriat manakala si suami sudah tidak sabar lagi untuk menimang cahaya mata .

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Cewek Disaster Paham Cara FYP Di Hatiku
programme.desc: Pada mulanya, Lisna ingin membantu rakan baiknya, Nuri, kerana teman lelaki Nuri meninggalkannya dan berkahwin lain. Bagaimanapun, ia adalah salah faham, dan kini Lisna menjadi viral kerana dia merempuh perkahwinan selebriti terkenal.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep114
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep11
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep11
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep40
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep89
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kurasakan Nikmat Allah Di Malam Lailatul Qadar
programme.desc: Kekufuran Naryo dalam menjalani kehidupannya, dia tidak pernah melaksanakan perintah Tuhan. Kehidupan Naryo berubah apabila dia muflis dan isterinya yang tidak setia, Ida, meninggalkannya.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep35
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep36

programme.title: Cobaan Penjual Takjil Keliling Yang Ingin Bertaubat Di Bulan Ramadan
programme.desc: Erik mendapat petunjuk selepas melakukan penipuan menggunakan wang rasuah korporatnya. Dia bertaubat, dan kini menjual takjil untuk menampung kehidupannya.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep90
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Josée to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Inseparable Bros
programme.desc: Though not biologically related, two disabled men form a sibling-like relationship after spending 20 years together.

programme.title: A Little Princess

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. programme.title: The Talent Ep6
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10231024
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1801
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45884589
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1801
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3582
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2020
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Jiang Play(M) Ep8
programme.desc: We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Miracles of The Namiya General Store, The
programme.desc: From Japan's best-selling author, Keigo Higashino, comes a heartwarming fantasy of an everyday general store that becomes a portal through time. When three delinquents accidentally enter the premise, they trigger a series of events that allow a letter from the past, seeking advice, to mysteriously slips through the mail slot.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named “The Fastest Sword” but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son’s arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Storm Warning
programme.desc: During a ferocious storm, two teenagers lose sight of the 10-year-old boy they’re babysitting and he disappears – never to be found. 20 years later, the news of the murder of their high-school teacher forces them to confront their traumas and old wounds.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: The Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Annabel seduces married men and blackmails them for cash. But what goes around comes around, and she ends up getting cheated by another con artist, Tom. When the perfect targets appear for both to win big, a war begins – but so does an unexpected love.

programme.title: The Rising Tide
programme.desc: When her father fails to return home, the sound of his boat’s engine is the only thing a daughter has to remember of him. Learning from an elderly mechanic, she wishes to repair her father’s boat in hope of his return.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Dead Girls From Vienna
programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.desc: Day 492 - Season two finale. The FBI question Diane as part of a job background check on Kurt, leading to unexpected and serious consequences. The mayor of Chicago invites Adrian and Julius to join a 'think tank' tasked with figuring out how to spend funds.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep114
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: Category 5
programme.desc: A series of disastrous geological coincidences occur creating a perfect storm scenario and forming the largest hurricane in human history.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: See the mass production of curly fries, plus red velvet cakes with cream cheese frosting, vegetable pot pies, and marshmallow squares covered in vanilla caramel.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: Fish fingers are covered with batter and bread crumbs; puffed corn meal is coated with caramel; creating crinkle-cut sweet potato fries; and cookie dough batter is frozen, then smothered in chocolate.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: In the Grip of the Seasons - The only option for the Arctic's top predators, the wolf, the Arctic fox and the polar bear, is to continually adapt to their changing world, exploiting the good times and enduring the bad.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Joanna travels from the very south of the country all the way to the foothills of the Himalayas. In Madurai she explores the multi-coloured and dazzling Meenakshi temple which comes alive at night with religious celebration.

programme.title: Fearless 48 Hours (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Rob Delaney - Comedian Rob Delaney joins former Special Forces operative Jason Fox in rural Wales, to take on three daring challenges, including a jump off a 40-metre viaduct.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But it’s not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. It’s actually a diver’s paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Chobe National Park: Land of Learning - In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africa’s most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But it’s not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. It’s actually a diver’s paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Elephant Rescue - When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Road to Recovery - Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix Herd - Camp Phoenix in Zambia’s Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills they’ll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Outbreak! - The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: These sloppy joes are slightly alternative but they are ridiculously addictive served up with an Asian inspired slaw and crispy onions. You can make your own crispy onions - or buy them ready made!

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep5
programme.desc: TGI Fridays - Along with a lot of its competitors in the casual dining industry, TGI Fridays has fallen on hard times. The CEO tasked with turning things around is Ray Blanchette.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S7) Ep3
programme.desc: Stratford-upon-Avon - In Stratford-upon-Avon, George helps Laura and Jonnie transform their mock-Tudor Edwardian house. In Essex, Nicki's 1920s cottage needs major changes.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep4
programme.desc: Zimbabwean-born Davi and Matt from Australia set out to build a house in the Chess Valley with a radical multicultural design. They decide to manage the venture themselves, and it's not long before the build veers off course.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Rachel wraps up her Melbourne immersion with a look into the city's current and future food trends. She meets a Thai couple that have crafted a passion for Asian fusion food with a unique all day breakfast menu.

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: For the semi-final, it's social media week. The cooks must level up basic biscuits into Insta-worthy desserts and create a street food menu that would wow on socials.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep7
programme.desc: In heat four, the Skills Test involves eggs benedict and a strawberry dessert. Then each of the four chefs must wow the judges with their Signature Dishes to earn a quarter-final place.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep5
programme.desc: TGI Fridays - Along with a lot of its competitors in the casual dining industry, TGI Fridays has fallen on hard times. The CEO tasked with turning things around is Ray Blanchette.

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: For the semi-final, it's social media week. The cooks must level up basic biscuits into Insta-worthy desserts and create a street food menu that would wow on socials.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S7) Ep4
programme.desc: Clapham and Hove - In Clapham, Masum and Maria's Victorian terraced home no longer works for their family. In Hove, Louis and Sarah tackle the upstairs of their 16th-century gatehouse.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Donal and Max go back home to the fair city of Dublin. A city steeped in tradition, innovation, culture, craic and culinary delights.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Celebration Meal - Jamie makes an incredible celebration meal of rainbow tomato crostini and an epic slow-roasted lamb shoulder, finished off with strawberry panna cottas and mango caipirinhas.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep8
programme.desc: This quarter-final sees the strongest four chefs from heats three and four prepare a dish based around mustard. Then they must cook for critics Grace Dent, Tom Parker Bowles and William Sitwell.

programme.desc: Victoria and Raheel - Two architects compete using virtual reality to remodel a 1990s build in Milton Keynes. Will the finished design fulfill the dreams of the family of six who live there?

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Donal and Max go back home to the fair city of Dublin. A city steeped in tradition, innovation, culture, craic and culinary delights.

programme.desc: Summer of Love San Francisco - Gordon, Gino and Fred's are in San Francisco. They sample the cuisine and take a balloon ride to Napa valley and finally back on the bay to sample Moon Cake and Chinese cooking.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Extreme Escapes - In Cambodia we venture to the banks of the Timor Rung River to the Shinta Mani Wild Hotel. A series of 15 tents deep in the wilderness and accessible only after a 3 hour drive from Phnom Penh, access is via a 400 metre zip wire.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Nadiya returns to Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years, to discover the people preserving old, local traditions and others creating new ones.

programme.desc: Lighthorne - George takes on a 17th-century cottage in Lighthorne, Warwickshire. Builder Anthony and physiotherapist Emily are determined to turn this ramshackle build into their family home.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Scotland - In Scotland, Nadiya is shown by a local forager how wild herbs have all the flavour and spice to create a Scottish curry, and mills her own flour.

programme.desc: Heat five continues as the four chefs try to impress the judges with their Signature Dishes. The two who deliver the best dishes will go through to the quarter-finals.

programme.desc: In Derbyshire, Mike and Sarah set out to build a multigenerational longhouse. But with a complicated roof, a shortage of materials and an unexpected bereavement, it proves far from easy...

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep32
programme.desc: Castles and Caves - Archibald and his siblings embark on a quest in a Castles and Caves adventure game. As the Strutters delve into the fantasy realm, they realize that Archibald’s unusual choices will make the quest even more challenging. / Archibald and his siblings continue on their Castles and Caves adventure game. When they face off against the witch, they have to trust Archibald’s unique approach to hopefully win the game.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep6
programme.desc: Cereal / Tiny Danger - The Harvey street kids set out to solve the mystery of who stole their one of a kind cereal! Lotta fights back when Tiny is told that he’s too small to race in a bike race.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep32
programme.desc: Castles and Caves - Archibald and his siblings embark on a quest in a Castles and Caves adventure game. As the Strutters delve into the fantasy realm, they realize that Archibald’s unusual choices will make the quest even more challenging. / Archibald and his siblings continue on their Castles and Caves adventure game. When they face off against the witch, they have to trust Archibald’s unique approach to hopefully win the game.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep15
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 1 - When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep16
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 2 - As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.
